title: Chapter 5 Added
description: A new chapter was added to the Avowed collection and several characters were updated.

title: Rebuild
description: The web is being rebuilt from the ground up to solve the problem of forgetting things.

title: Adding the notes page
description: A new page has been added with notes, it has the last two session from the Curse of Strahd campaign.

title: Adding all the notes for the Candlekeep campaign
description: A new page has been added with notes, it has the last two session from the Candlekeep campaign.

title: Adding all the players and NPCs for the Candlekeep campaign
description: The characters for the Candlekeep campaign have been updated. There is also improved searching, using the URL and ability to search multiple terms. The home page is updated with the API for the data on the website.

title: Creating the appendix page
description: Adding a new appendix page with all the items shared with the Candlekeep Mysteries campaign.

title: Updating Candlekeep Mysteries notes with Chapter 6
description: Adding several notes for the Candlekeep Mysteries campaign.

title: Adding a brand new shop and services section
description: You can now look at what items and animals sell for.

title: Update CoS chapter, new Random section in Shops & Services
description: Updating the CoS campaign with the latest, long, chapter. There is now a random section which will allow for picking random items as well as other improvments to the Shops

title: Update CoS appendix with card readings
Update CoS with Chapter 36
description: Adding chapter 36 and the letter from Rolando.

title: Update CM with Chapter 8
description: Adding chapter 8 of the Candlekeep Mysteries campaign.

title: Update CM with Chapter 9
description: Adding chapter 9 of the Candlekeep Mysteries campaign.
